veil.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a thin piece of material that women wear to cover their faces at formal occasions or for religious reasons
veil.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She lifted her veil with both hands.
veil.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to cover something with a veil
veil.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: A black kerchief modestly veiled her hair.
veil.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to partly hide something so that it cannot be seen clearly
veil.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: A fine rain was beginning to veil the hills.
